channel.title: Zipapp on uname Linux

item.title: Python Packaging
item.description: Where to start? With the holidays fast approaching, I thought I would dedicate a blog post to packaging, specifically Python packaging. I’ll go ahead and say it, packaging Python projects is confusing. If we go to the official Python documentation and take a look at the Distributing Python Modules section we get the following information about these projects: Distutils - Added to the Python standard library in 1998. The direct use of Distutils is currently being phased out.
